about_the_game:
Complete original soundtrack to Boneworks, totaling over two full hours of analog synth goodness. (Any additional songs written for the game and added post launch WILL be included in future updates).
RECOMMENDED USE: For content creators (Streamers / Youtubers), we recommend turning off the in game music for editing, then using the songs from this soundtrack to overlay in your videos for continuous music.
RECOMMENDED USE: Everyone else, enjoy!

Track Listing


1. Bone Theme - 04:48
2. Bone Rhapsody - 02:08
3. Ambient Existence - 04:27
4. Who Am I - 04:54
5. Ambient_A - 04:30
6. The Museum - 02:24
7. Ambient Travel - 03:16
8. Analog Sunrise - 03:54
9. Runoff - 03:35
10. Null - 03:39
11. Bone Battle - 02:42
12. Sunset Arthur - 2:11
13. Deep Dive - 02:57
14. Subtle Aggression - 03:13
15. MythOS - 03:49
16. What Am I - 03:46
17. House of Monogon - 03:00
18. Constant Rising - 00:59
19. Opera De Ossium - 05:12
20. Opera De Ossium (Synth) - 5:12
21. Fantasy Bone Arena - 04:05
22. Bad Fantasy - 03:09
23. Midnight Void - 02:46
24. Spectrum Omega - 02:58
25. Midnight Void Dark - 02:46
26. Light Shine Through - 04:27
27. Pick It Up - 03:18
28. Monomat Jingle - 00:24
29. Little Tuscany - 02:49
30. Creeping - 03:22
31. Tactical Trial - 03:21
32. Zombo Mode - 09:21

BONETONES AMBIENT (EXTRA)
1. Atlantis Crossing - 04:21
2. Monodrone - 07:25
3. Electric Breathing - 01:05
4. Electric Humming - 00:51
5. Layered Darkness - 00:30
6. Subhall - 01:06
7. Redflag - 03:05
8. Void Flutes - 06:37
9. Tunnels - 01:19
10. Underwul - 09:59

Content Creation License

1. By purchasing this soundtrack, you are granted a "Limited License" for content creation and public presentation in conjunction with any recorded Boneworks gameplay footage.

2. Limited License allows the purchaser (you) to use any song, in its entirety, in content creation (example: youtube video, twitch streams, etc.) in conjunction exclusively with Boneworks footage.
3. If you have any questions about this Content Creation License, please feel free to reach out to the listed contact email.

Credits


Written and Produced by: Michael Wyckoff
Additional Performances by: Jonathan LaMarche, Tim Na, Hadrian Mcquaid, Mike Cooper
Ambient tracks by: Alex Knoll

name: BONETONES - Official BONEWORKS OST
short_description: BONETONES is the complete original soundtrack for BONEWORKS. Plenty of analog synthesizer tunes.
